content: this is a summary of a legal text about a case in the district court in ljubljana the case is about the payment of costs and it started on march 7 2019 and ended on september 2 2019 the responsible party for the costs is being compensated the final resolution involves dividing the goods between two exspouses including real estate with each party receiving half the total value of the goods is 11466450 eur the decision in this case is based on a specific law called the civil procedure act specifically section 306 the court settlement is confidential so the details cannot be disclosed
